PSCT.Base: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 Level 1 Machine monster from your Deck to your hand. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Morphtronic" monster from your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 "Gadget Hauler" from your hand or Deck. You can only use each effect of "Gadget Gamer" once per turn.
